title: KHR_physics_rigid_bodies Node Trigger Property
description: Parameters describing a volume used for collison detection, but does not cause a collision response.

shape.description: The index of the shape in the top level shapes array.

nodes.description: For compound triggers, the set of descendant glTF nodes with a trigger property that make up this compound trigger.

collisionFilter.description: The index of the filter information in the top level collisionFilters array.
